messages.subject: flax seed oil/Marji
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/6/03 6:27:57 AM Central Standard Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/6/03 6:27:57 AM Central Standard Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Oh brother! I'm really asleep at the wheel here! I meant to say that I
use flaxseed MEAL in my baking, not the oil. >>

OH!! I sent of the last email without reading this Marji!! I was scratching
my head thinking "why would Marji recomend heating flax seed oil?" LOL
I just KNEW you wouldn't do that.....
I like mixing some flax seed meal in with my yogurt. I buy plain yogurt and
mix honey and flax in for a rather crunchy version. :)

Ren
"The world's much smaller than you think. Made up of two kinds of
people--simple and complicated.....The simple ones are contented. The
complicated ones aren't."
